  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9f698c2d-30f7-4904-80a0-58a854789a2d#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mozart: Varázsfuvola</string>
            <string language="en">Mozart: Magic flute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mozart: Magische Flöte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mozart : Cannelure magique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mozart: Flauta mágica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mozart: Scanalatura magica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μότσαρτ: Μαγικό φλάουτο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mozart: Flauta mágica</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Tamino, vidd magaddal a csodafurulyát! Papageno, fogd a bűvös csengettyűt!</string>
            <string language="en">Tamino, take the madic flute with you! Papageno, hold the charming hand-bell!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">wolfgang amadeus mozart varázsfuvola ,  </string>
            <string language="en">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, magic flute</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tamino, nehmen die madic Flöte mit Ihnen! 
Papageno, halten die bezaubernde Hand-Glocke an!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tamino, prennent la cannelure madic avec vous ! 
Papageno, tiennent la main-cloche charmante !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tamino, faz exame da flauta madic com você! 
Papageno, prende o mão-sino charming!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tamino, vi prende la scanalatura madic con! 
Papageno, tiene la mano-flangia affascinante!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Tamino, παίρνει το madic φλάουτο με σας! 
Το Papageno, κρατά το γοητευτικό χέρι-κουδούνϊ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Tamino, toma la flauta madic con usted! 
¡Papageno, sostiene la mano-alarma encantadora!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, magische Flöte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, cannelure magique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, flauta mágica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, scanalatura magica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βολφγκαγκ Amadeus Mozart, μαγικό φλάουτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, flauta mágica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
